summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1573, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Northwest, from Market Street to West Sixty-fifth Street, by regrading and curbing the same, and by the construction of concrete sidewalks with wooden cross walks, under Ordinance No. 16796 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
